original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 2.6-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices edged down by 2.6 percent from a week ago at an auction on March 09, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts fell to 82,151.06 from 84,355.08 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority.
The highest price was 88,300 rupees for 1,000 nuts down from the previous week’s 91,600 rupees, while the lowest was 75,100 also down from 77,500 rupees.
The auction offered 876,948 coconuts and 658,494 nuts were sold. (Colombo/Mar 13/2023)
